price: 55. Ma waxay moodaan waxa aanu siinno ee maal iyo carruur ah.
arabic: أَيَحۡسَبُونَ أَنَّمَا نُمِدُّهُم بِهِۦ مِن مَّالٖ وَبَنِينَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: ayaḥsabūna annamā numidduhum bihi min mālin wabanīna
